question: The ball game was a large part of ancient Mesoamerican culture that integrated political, religious, and social life. Which of the following best describes how this game was played?

answers.text: Players kicked a rubber ball to one end of the court.
Players used a stick to hit a rubber ball into holes in the ground.
Players from two teams tried to toss a ball into a stone hoop attached to the sides of a ball court.
Players attempted to bounce a rubber ball without using their hands through stone hoops attached to the sides of the ball court.
